short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create email aliases for your own domains using Cloudflare Email Routing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides an easy way to turn Cloudflare Email Routing into your own private email alias service, similar to AnonAddy, SimpleLogin, and others. No third-party services or tedious configuration of a self-hosted email server needed.
